titleStmt.title: Sefautian's farewel: or, Fair Silvia's matchless cruelty. To an excellent new tune: or, Sefautian's farewel.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for J. Deacon, at the Angel in Guiltspur-Street, without Newgate,

notesStmt.note: Place of publication suggested by Wing (2nd ed.).
At end of text: "this may be printed, R. P."
Reproduction of original in: Bodleian Library.
